item.description: A spectacular day of Live Entertainment for ALL to ENJOY! This will be a great event for members from the world meet up group to come out and enjoy a great day of vending, food, and music. It is from 10 - 6 and a Free community event. The Fifth Annual One Heart Festival will take place on Saturday, September 10th at 661 Washington Street in Codman Square (Dorchester). A FREE & FUN DAY FOR THE FAMILY. The mission of this festival is to bring together Bostons diverse communities for a day of live entertainment, food, and specialty shopping in hopes that all can enjoy a full day of PEACE & UNITY. Come Listen to the great Multi-Cultrural Sounds of R&B, African Drums, Reggae, Dancehall and more from the Commonwealth and beyond. Featuring live music performances by: Anguile, Dis-N-Dat Band, Ezemdi Chikwendu, Fiyah Binghi, Garrisun Famally, I-Medz, Iron Zion, Jahriffe, Jah Jah Drummers, Janey David, King-I, Livalect, Mamado, Raymon Jamez, Super Adonai, Tiggana / Lance Gordon and Truthful. Additional music by 105.3FM, DJ Wreckage and more. Please visit our website for more info: www.oneheartfestival.com
item.name: This Saturday is the 5th Annual One Heart Festival in Codman Sq in Dorchester.
